name: Mental Health Center of East Central Kansas a Corporation

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mental Health Center of East Central Kansas a Corporation is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Emporia, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.0M in Medicaid payments across 112K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
